mechanics.condition: Creature of your choice within range
mechanics.outcome: Make a ranged spell attack against the target
The next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage

description_text: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.
